content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.F_SSTOrder') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.F_SSTOrder
GO

IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_SSTOrder') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_SSTOrder
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_SSTOrder (
[lms_order_id] int,
[lms_order_idold] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_corderno] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_custref] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_waybillid] int,
[lms_order_pickupcustid] int,
[lms_order_delivercustid] int,
[lms_order_billcustid] int,
[lms_order_ovalue] numeric(18,2),
[lms_order_hodate] datetime2(7),
[lms_order_cservice] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_courierid] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_custservice] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_userid] int,
[lms_order_pcode] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_appointment] datetime2(7),
[lms_order_deliverby] datetime2(7),
[lms_order_dconfirmed] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_dcomment] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_drefno] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_duserid] int,
[lms_order_nopods] int,
[lms_order_duedate] datetime2(7),
[lms_order_batchno] int,
[lms_order_units] int,
[lms_order_airfreightflag] int,
[lms_order_custref3] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_specdel] int,
[lms_order_flunits] int,
[lms_order_flkgs] int,
[lms_order_inservice] datetime2(7),
[lms_order_custdocs] int,
[lms_order_scanned] datetime2(7),
[lms_order_scanimagename1] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_scanimagename] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_changereasonid] int,
[lms_order_bill_servicetype] int,
[lms_order_bill_vehicletype] int,
[lms_order_quote] numeric(18,2),
[lms_order_consignlabel] int,
[lms_order_custref2] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_callprogid] int,
[lms_order_callprogupddate] datetime2(7),
[lms_order_submitedi] int,
[lms_order_lastupdate] datetime2(7),
[lms_order_quoteflag] int,
[lms_order_bill_minrate] numeric(18,2),
[lms_order_bill_addrate] numeric(18,2),
[lms_order_bill_minkg] numeric(18,2),
[lms_order_notes] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_order_quoteweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_order_orderconsolidationid] int,
[lms_order_quotefuellevy] numeric(18,2),
[lms_order_quoteothersurcharges] numeric(18,2),
[lms_order_quotedocfees] numeric(18,2),
[lms_bcustomer_id] int,
[lms_bcustomer_name] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_pcustomer_id] int,
[lms_pcustomer_name] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_dcustomer_id] int,
[lms_dcustomer_name] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_users_id] int,
[lms_users_fullname] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_users_site] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_parcelbyorder_orderid] int,
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrchargeweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrvolweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrvolumiserweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrmaxweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrnoparcels] bigint,
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrweightexclspecdel] numeric(18,2),
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrchargeweightexclspecdel] numeric(18,2),
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrvolweightexclspecdel] numeric(18,2),
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrvolumiserweightexclspecdel] numeric(18,2),
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrmaxweightexclspecdel] numeric(18,2),
[lms_parcelbyorder_aggrnoparcelsexclspecdel] bigint,

	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstorder.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_SSTOrder
GO
